text: Yaqeenan kufr kiya un logon ne jinhon ne kaha ke Allah Maseeh ibne Mariyam hi hai, halanke Maseeh ne kaha tha ke “ aey bani Israel! Allah ki bandagi karo jo mera Rubb bhi hai aur tumhara Rubb bhi”. Jisne Allah ke saath kisi ko shareek thehraya uspar Allah ne Jannat haraam kardi aur uska thikana jahannum hai aur aisey zaalimon ka koi madadgaar nahin
